description: An illustration of a necklace consisting of a blue heart-shaped gem surrounded by a thick silver border on a silver chain; there are five small bubbles surrounding the necklace, implying that it is in a body of water. The title of the puzzle ("Titanic trinket") is a reference to the 1997 film of the same name; in the movie, a necklace with this same design (named the "Heart of the Ocean") plays a large part in the plot and is ultimately dropped into the Atlantic Ocean to return to the shipwreck site.

author.name: VertexArchive
author.description: An UNOFFICIAL archive of the New York Times' Vertex puzzle. This account is not affiliated with the NY Times. I just like the triangles.
